assessments.status_rationale: Headlines indicate the shutdown appears near an end, but there is no clear confirmation of an enacted CR/appropriations bill signed by the President. Deadline (2025-11-14) still open.
No mention of new OFAC Iran-related sanctions designations in today’s coverage; awaiting Treasury releases before 2025-11-30.
No FDA/CDER action reported regarding removal of boxed warnings on MHT products.
No evidence provided on 3M–10Y spread steepening; government data disruptions further limit confirmation via FRED. Window runs to 2025-11-30.
Retail Sales advance report timing is impacted by the shutdown; no print for the control group is available yet.
Event window (2025-11-22 to 2025-12-10) has not begun; no ERCOT peak load evidence yet.
No reports of top-10 U.S. card issuers announcing rewards reductions.
No confirmation that ETH traded at or above $3,600; requires market data before 2025-11-30.
EIA reporting has been disrupted; no weekly propane/propylene draw of ≥2.0 million barrels is cited.
December 2025 FOMC decision remains in the future; no new signals today that finalize outcome.
